name: Josh Miller
body:
## [@joshm](http://www.twitter.com/joshm)

![Josh Miller](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/40125507/Josh%20Miller.png)

### Basic Info

Just before my senior year, I left Princeton University to build [Branch](http://www.branch.com). Originally from Santa Monica, CA, I currently live in New York City's East Village. I'm twenty-two years old and a proud donor to [KCRW](http://www.kcrw.com/).

You can learn more about my story in [The New York Observer](http://betabeat.com/2012/05/josh-miller-branch-profile-05022012/?show=all).

### Products

* [Branch](http://www.branch.com)
* [Potluck](http://www.potluck.it)
* [Tracking to Nowhere](www.youtube.com/watch?v=NcSxJQ6gyLY)

### Writing

* [Tenth Grade Tech Trends](https://medium.com/product-design/d8d4f2300cf3)
* [The Next Facebook](https://medium.com/musings-about-text-boxes/8157c364d26a)
* [FWD.us Breaks Its First Promise: To Be Different](https://medium.com/i-m-h-o/7c2042e0d0df)

### Influences

* My Dad and Mom, Seth and Josephine Miller
* My Godfather, [Mark Winogrond](http://articles.latimes.com/2005/sep/17/local/me-planner17)
* [Evan Williams](https://medium.com/@ev/)
* [Jonah Peretti](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jonah_Peretti)
* [Jason Goldman](www.buzzfeed.com/robf4/the-silent-partner)
* [Scott Heiferman](http://www.heiferman.com/mcd/)
* [Clay Shirky](http://shirky.com/writings/)
* [Bret Victor](http://worrydream.com/)
* [Paul Ford](http://www.ftrain.com/)
* [Ai Weiwei](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ai_Weiwei)
* [Banksy](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banksy)
* [Jamie XX](http://www.jamiexx.com/)
